talk.author: did:plc:c6mwekbfhtw6wn3nx7fvsayd
talk.utter: Then you'd have to get a bunch of highly technical individuals to agree on something, which is a whole mess in my experience...

talk.author: did:plc:juinyhpjdmrsjiazavbaelqr
talk.utter:
The Feeds in bsky are basically "algorithms". So bsky found a way for you to have an algo without needing "all the highly technical individuals to agree".

You just follow the feeds/algos you like.

talk.author: did:plc:c6mwekbfhtw6wn3nx7fvsayd
talk.utter: Oh yeah, absolutely. I just mean implementing that on Mastodon would mean figuring out exactly how to configure which algorithms, and that sounds like quite a journey.
